artist: Etcher: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully; Designer: Guillaume Voiriot
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
description: portrait of a man wearing a fur-trimmed cloak and dark headscarf, with proper L arm resting on books; books and astronomer's tool at L in background; inscription below portrait
signed: LLC, in the plate: [Vorio pinx]; LRC, in the plate: [A.L. De Lalive Sc.]
title: Portrait of Bernard de Fontenelle, no. 52, from a recueil of etchings
